geometry.planar

Class FloatLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • geometry.planar.FloatLine

  • public class FloatLine
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a line in the plane by to FloatPoints. Calculations with FloatLines are generally not exact. For that reason collinearity for example is not defined for FloatLines. If exactnesss is needed, use the class Line instead.
    Version:
    $Id: $Id
    Author:
    Alfons Wirtz

      Calculates the intersection of this line with p_other.

      Calculates the nearest point on this line to p_from_point between this.a and this.b.

      Returns the projection of p_line_segment onto this oriented line segment by moving p_line_segment perpendicular into the direction of this line segmant Returns null, if the projection is empty or p_line_segment.a == p_line_segment.b

      • intersection

        public FloatPoint intersection(FloatLine p_other)
        Calculates the intersection of this line with p_other. Returns null, if the lines are parallel.
        Parameters:
        p_other - a FloatLine object.
        Returns:
        a FloatPoint object.

      • translate

        public FloatLine translate(double p_dist)
        translates the line perpendicular at about p_dist. If p_dist > 0, the line will be translated to the left, else to the right
        Parameters:
        p_dist - a double.
        Returns:
        a FloatLine object.

      • signed_distance

        public double signed_distance(FloatPoint p_point)
        Returns the signed distance of this line from p_point. The result will be positive, if the line is on the left of p_point, else negative.
        Parameters:
        p_point - a FloatPoint object.
        Returns:
        a double.

        Returns:
        a FloatPoint object.

      • segment_projection

        public FloatLine segment_projection(FloatLine p_line_segment)
        Returns the perpendicular projection of p_line_segment onto this oriented line segment, Returns null, if the projection is empty.
        Parameters:
        p_line_segment - a FloatLine object.
        Returns:
        a FloatLine object.

      • segment_projection_2

        public FloatLine segment_projection_2(FloatLine p_line_segment)
        Returns the projection of p_line_segment onto this oriented line segment by moving p_line_segment perpendicular into the direction of this line segmant Returns null, if the projection is empty or p_line_segment.a == p_line_segment.b
        Parameters:
        p_line_segment - a FloatLine object.
        Returns:
        a FloatLine object.

      • shrink_segment

        public FloatLine shrink_segment(double p_offset)
        Shrinks this line on both sides by p_value. The result will contain at least the gravity point of the line.
        Parameters:
        p_offset - a double.
        Returns:
        a FloatLine object.

      • nearest_segment_point

        public FloatPoint nearest_segment_point(FloatPoint p_from_point)
        Calculates the nearest point on this line to p_from_point between this.a and this.b.
        Parameters:
        p_from_point - a FloatPoint object.
        Returns:
        a FloatPoint object.

      • divide_segment_into_sections

        public FloatLine[] divide_segment_into_sections(int p_count)
        Divides this line segment into p_count line segments of nearly equal length. and at most p_max_section_length.
        Parameters:
        p_count - a int.
        Returns:
        an array of FloatLine objects.
